pages.text: Black matter is a necessary item to obtain the powerful metals of Terramity.$(br2)It can only be obtained after defeating the $(l:terramity:bosses/trial_guardian)Trial Guardian$() and obtaining a perish staff.

pages.title: Bedrock Black Matter Ore
pages.text: Bedrock black matter ore, found on the surface of the nether.

pages.title: Decayed Black Matter Ore
pages.text: Decayed black matter ore, now able to be mined.

The $(l:terramity:bosses/trial_guardian)Trial Guardian$() drops a perish staff when defeated, a necessary item to progress. Using the perish staff on bedrock black matter ore will decay it, allowing it to be mined.
